Package nl.codevs.strinput.system

Interface StrUser

All Known Implementing Classes:
DiscordUser, SpigotConsole, SpigotUser
public interface StrUser
Instance of a user (the sender/receiver, end-user client).
Since:
v0.1

      default void sendMessage​(@NotNull @NotNull List<Str> messages)
      Send multiple messages to the user. Uses a loop of sendMessage(nl.codevs.strinput.system.text.Str).
      Parameters:

    • supportsContext

      boolean supportsContext()
      If this sender supports context, i.e. has values it stores for getting data automatically (instead of specifying it in commands).
      Returns:
      true if the user supports context

    • hasPermission

      boolean hasPermission​(@NotNull @NotNull String permission)
      Whether this user has permission for a certain node or not.
      Parameters:
      permission - the permissions node
      Returns:
      true if permitted.
